It's not compatible with other smart home devices or other music apps like Spotify. FOMO news the new fud, next thing you know they'll whine and shut down more stores due to more made up variants.

links.title: CCI orders investigation into Apple's business practices in India
links.description: Read more about CCI orders investigation into Apple's business practices in India on Business Standard. The complainant argued that Apple's imposition of a 30% in-app fee for distribution of paid digital content and other restrictions hurts competition by raising costs for app developers and customers

body: $aapl Apple to Unveil AR/VR Headset at WWDC 2022 https://www.iClarified.com/83962

links.title: Apple to Unveil AR/VR Headset at WWDC 2022 But It Likely Won't Ship Until 2023 [Analyst]
links.description: Apple will unveil its long rumored AR/VR headset at WWDC 2022 but won't ship the device until 2023, according to a prediction from analyst Gene Munster. While it won't be ready for sale, we believe WWDC 2022 is the most likely time for Apple to preview its mixed reality headset.

links.title: Could Apple's Market Cap Hit $4 Trillion in 2022? | The Motley Fool
links.description: Shares of technology giant ( Apple NASDAQ:AAPL) soared in 2021. As of Dec. 30, the stock had gained 34% in 2021. This put the market cap at more than $2.9 trillion. While many recent headlines about the company have focused on its market capitalization approaching $3 trillion, investors might be wise to consider an even more bullish target: $4 trillion.
